data.description: Get current and historic facts & information about a person from Wikidata.
examples: What is the occupation of Linus Torvalds
What is Linus Torvalds date of birth
What is Abraham Lincoln date of death
What is Steve Jobs spouse name
data.name: Wikidata Skill

data.description: Random facts from 8 Fact
data.name: 8Fact Skill

data.description: Play Live News from The Weather Channel with Mycroft
examples: Open The Weather Channel Live Stream
Show The Weather Channel Live Stream
data.name: TWC Stream

data.description:
Track the location of the International Space Station

#Examples
"Where is the ISS"
"Who is on board of the space station"
"When is the ISS passing over"
"Tell me about the ISS"
"how many persons on board of the space station"
examples: tell me about international space station
Who is on board of the space station
how many persons on board of the space station
When is the ISS passing over
data.name: ISS Tracker Skill

data.description:
Near real time Satellite imagery from NASA's Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite

## Examples
* "show my location from space"
* "show me london from space"
* "next picture"
* "previous picture"
* "show my house from space last month"
*...
examples: show my house from space last month
talk about Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite
data.name: Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite Skill

data.description:
Pictures and quick facts from Hubble Space Telescope

## Examples
* "picture from hubble site"
* "explain"
* "tell me about the hubble telescope"
* "who was hubble"
* "what is hubble space telescope mission"
* "why was hubble created"
*...
examples: tell me about the hubble telescope
what is hubble space telescope mission
can hubble take pictures of earth
can hubble see things on the moon
Can we see live photos from Hubble
Are the colors in hubble images real
data.name: Hubble Space Telescope Skill

data.description:
Daily sunspot data from Sunspot Index and Long-term Solar Observations and pictures from NASA's Solar and Heliospheric Observatory

## Examples
* "Live picture of the sun"
* "whats the number of sunspots"
* "how many sunspots yesterday"
* "how many sunspots 3...
examples: show me a picture of the solar corona
ultraviolet sun picture at 2 million degrees
show me magnetic field of the sun
data.name: Helioviewer Skill

data.description:
How to do nearly everything.

Ever wondered about how to boil an egg, or the best way to brush your teeth. This skill enables
Mycroft to answer a lot of "how to" questions with step by step guide

* "how to boil an egg"
* "give me a random how to"
*...
examples: give me a random how to
data.name: Wikihow Skill

data.description:
Ask general-knowledge queries
CommonQuery skill for Wolfram Alpha
You'll be surprised by how much it knows!

You can also explicitly request to "ask the wolf"

NOTE: this is meant to be a better alternative to the official mycroft skill, it will blacklist the...
examples: ask the wolf what is the speed of light
When was The Rocky Horror Picture Show released?
How many inches in a meter?
data.name: Wolfram Alpha

data.description:
Check Wikipedia for answers to all your questions. Get just a summary, or ask for more to get in-depth information.

This Skill uses the [wikipedia for humans](https://github.com/HelloChatterbox/wikipedia_for_humans).

NOTE: this will blacklist the official mycroft...
examples: Tell me about the Pembroke Welsh Corgi
data.name: Wikipedia Skill
